column4: can someone help me out, can't connect to internet, host os = win 7 x64 ultimate, guess ubuntu, software =vmware workstation, have the setting set as bridge..., in ubuntu i let it find etho
I hope that's just for trying Ubuntu and later you will put it on the hard disk for real, try #vmware for your issue
well  for security reasons and such it's usally best to avoide running Windows as a host OS
well Ubuntu basics aren't  that difficult to learn, check out the Ubuntu Pocket Guide by the way
